name: Lonsdale Capital Partners
overview: Lonsdale Capital Partners operates exclusively at the smaller end of the private equity market. They generally look to buy and build companies with an enterprise value of Â£10m to Â£50m. Their focus is the UK and Northern Europe. They make investments in a wide variety of sectors, in companies that are cash generative and where the business model is clear. Their passion is to help good quality businesses and management teams grow their franchises, providing the finance and expertise to reach their full potential. They look to take majority stakes in the companies in which they invest.

funding_round.source_description: EMCAS Receives Majority Investment from Lonsdale Capital Partners
